all_results.question: Two genes (B and E) determine coat color in Labrador retrievers. Alleles B and b code for how much melanin is present. In this case, the alleles for pigment deposition (E or e) are said to be epistatic to the gene that codes for black or brown pigment. If the dominant allele (E) is not present, regardless of the genotype at the black/brown locus, the animal's fur will be yellow.

If the dominant allele (E) is not present, regardless of the genotype at the black/brown locus, the animal's fur will be yellow.

all_results.question: A researcher is experimenting with nerve transmission using neurons from a giant squid. At the beginning of the experiment, the axon is at rest and has a threshold measured at –70 mV at 37oC. The axon receives one stimulus that triggers one action potential in the axon. Subsequent stimuli are much stronger. Which of the following statements explains what happens when several strong stimuli are experienced by the axon?

choices.A: The axon becomes hyperpolarized to –90 mV.
choices.B: The axon becomes hyperpolarized to –50 mV.
choices.C: The strength of the action potential becomes greater.
choices.D: The frequency of the action potential increases.

all_results.prompt_used:
Read carefully and choose from (A, B, C, D).

Subsequent stimuli are much stronger. Which of the following statements explains what happens when several strong stimuli are experienced by the axon?
Select from the following.: (A) The axon becomes hyperpolarized to –90 mV.
(B) The axon becomes hyperpolarized to –50 mV.
(C) The strength of the action potential becomes greater.
(D) The frequency of the action potential increases.

all_results.question: DDT was once considered a "silver bullet" that would permanently eradicate insect pests. Today, instead, DDT is largely useless against many insects. Which of these would have been required for this pest eradication effort to be successful in the long run?

choices.A: Larger doses of DDT should have been applied.
choices.B: All habitats should have received applications of DDT at about the same time.
choices.C: The frequency of DDT application should have been higher.
choices.D: None of the individual insects should have possessed genomes that made them resistant to DDT.
